Content:: The Resolution on recognition of the state sovereignty of the Chechen Republic of Ichkeria is a bill proposed by Ukraine[1] in which the Ukrainian parliament will vote on the recognition of Chechnya's independence, in response to Russia's recognition of the Luhansk People's Republic and the Donetsk People's Republic. It was received by the Verkhovna Rada on July 11 and handed over to the leadership on the same day. It was sent to the committee for consideration on 13 July and was provided for reference on 14 July. It is currently being worked on in the committee.  This article relating to Ukraine is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Resolution on recognition of the state sovereignty of the Chechen Republic of Ichkeria - Wikipedia
